channel.title: Other people can connect but i cant
channel.description: Hello, i have my own server and all my friends can connect but i cant, my server is hosted of a vps and i have the same client as my friends, when i open the server it just keeps saying Connecting to server and stays there i dont have a clue whats wrong any help please?

item.description:

Your computer may also be blocking the connection for some reason, this I can’t say is true nor would I know how to check that because there are so many various options.
